equipment.itemName: Wood: Lyra Bow of Shadowy Dawn

options.name: Chill Wind Starfield
options.explain:
Lv. 50/85/100 Active Skill Atk. +17%
Atk. Increase +175%

[Sweeping Storm]
Lv. 50/85/100 skills create a Sweeping Storm that attacks enemies.
- Sweeping Storm damage 4,585%

[Wind God's Favor]
All speed +15%

[Gale's Rest]
Applies the following effects with the power of the winds that envelop the land. (Buffers excluded)
- Energy Beyond Limit's [Release Limiter] option can't be activated.
- Awakening skill link canceled
- Lv. 50 Skill Atk. +10%
- Lv. 50 skill cooldown -50%

[Raging Lightning Cloud]
Attacks summon a Raging Lightning Cloud that attacks up to 4 enemies and applies effects, depending on the number of equipped Thunder equipment (2/3/5).

- Inflicts 1,500%of total Atk. Increase, Neutralize Gauge -5
